text: Oct . 1 CENTRA L GOVERNMEN T Ac t t o provid e fo r th e extensio n o f certai n law s t o Par t B States . No . III . Par i B States (Laws) Act 1951. Ac t furthe r t o amen d th e Employers ' Liabilit y Ac t 1938 . No . V . Rule s t o regulat e th e grantin g o f certificate s o f competenc y t o engineer s (includin g moto r engineers) , unde r th e Merchan t Shippin g Ac t 1923 .
